import styles from './styles.module.scss' import { Layout } from "../../components/layouts" import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { IProduct } from '../../global/interfaces' import { RepositoryProduct } from '../../repository/Products' const ProductDetails = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState() useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0) const getProductById = async () => { const productId = Number((window as any).location.pathname.split('/')[2]) const repositoryProduct = new RepositoryProduct() repositoryProduct.getById(productId) } getProductById() }, []) return (
Product name

) } export default ProductDetails
